name: Destroy the Cowboys!
description:
You are Glorpus Dorpus, an alien fugitive from the far reaches of space who has crashlanded in the Wild West. Your goal? Destroy all the cowboys. Why? Because you're just that kind of alien.

You use platforming and shooter mechanics to traverse the 2D environment and blow up cowboys that want to see you dead just as much. You make use of a unique insanity meter, which increases your speed, power and allows you to use devastating abilities, such as calling a UFO to drop an exploding cow onto your foes.

Instructions:

- Platform your way through the level.

- Kill enemies and bosses.

- Drop cows out of UFO's.

- DESTROY THE COWBOYS!

Controls:

A & D - Movement

Space - Jump

Left Click - Shoot

Left Control - Shield

Q - Cow Bomb Ability (When you have enough insanity)

Level contains assets from the following pack:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/historic/polygon-western-l...
